about_the_game:
Welcome back to the Wastelands with the Wasteland Detritus Mini-Kit. This kit contains a collection of 58 items intended to add a little extra to your Wasteland levels. Mini-Kits are an affordable way of adding a some great assets, with a focus on small, detailed props, designed to bring your game to life.

Included in the Wasteland Detritus Mini-Kit you'll find:

3 x Modular Building to create a tower block of any height
4 x Post Apocalyptic Street Furniture
3 x Post Apocalyptic Street Lamps
13 x Mannequins and various Mannequin body parts
15 x Mixed Cobwebs
18 x Vintage Labelled Food Cans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
